data.title: Le droit à la vie (1917)
data.meta_description: Le droit à la vie: Directed by Abel Gance. With Paul Vermoyal, Léon Mathot, Andrée Brabant, Georges Paulais. A young girl marries a financier knowing he has only a short time to live, so she can inherit his money.Her lover, who has made a fortune away in America, returns and wants to hasten the financier's death.
